plot: Two players are engaged in a tense game of chess. One tries to decipher the story of the other's death through the moves in the game. By the end of the game, the player is changed forever.
title: 64 Squares
plot_es: Two players are engaged in a tense game of chess. One tries to decipher the story of the other's death through the moves in the game. By the end of the game, the player is changed forever.
plot_en: Two players are engaged in a tense game of chess. One tries to decipher the story of the other's death through the moves in the game. By the end of the game, the player is changed forever.
